Message.Text: Hey Frank! I heard my students are using Snapchat to share code. I hope they’re really enjoying it!
Actually, Tommy, they’re using Discord for that.
Oh, Discord? I thought it was Snapchat! But I’m still hopeful they’re collaborating well!
It’s definitely Discord. They have channels dedicated to coding projects.
That’s good to hear! I just want them to feel excited about learning, no matter the platform!
Exactly! Discord is great for fostering collaboration and communication.
Right! Whether it’s Snapchat or Discord, I really hope they find a way to make coding fun!
They are definitely using Discord, and I believe they’re making the most of it!
That’s what matters! I’m hopeful they’re all getting inspired to code!
